page.title: 07A Newark 10 year old's day
page.content: I wake up by myself. I get dressed and wake up everyone else. That is my brother and three sisters. After my wash, I brush my hair and have breakfast usually cornflakes and coffee, tea or drinking chocolate. My sister and I leave for school at 8.20. A.M. Its a long walk to school so we arrive there at 8.55. When the bell goes at 9.00., we line up at the classroom door, then go in and read a book for about 15 minutes. We do language work before play and maths after play. In maths I am on Peak book 5. At dinner time I go to my granny's and eat crisps or chips. I leave for school at 1.05 p.m. We arrive at school at 1.20. We play till 1.30. We do all sorts of work until hometime. We call at Granny's on our way home for a drink. Back at home I watch T.V. then ride my bike or play records.
